name: Halcyon (itch)
description:
Halcyon is a first-person puzzle game exploring the cyclical nature of life, ideas, inspiration and creativity. It challenges players to break routine, seek out new inspirations and think back to a time where they were more open-minded. It is a game focused on the creation of metaphor through symbolism and symbolic play.

Halcyon is roughly a 10 minute experience. The game is free to download and play, please only consider paying if you want to make a contribution to future projects. Thank you!

Disclaimer: this game runs on Unreal Engine 4 and is not optimised for commercial release. Your experience may be negatively affected when running the game on old or lower-end hardware.
